title: New optical imaging system could be deployed to find tiny tumors

title_detail.value: New optical imaging system could be deployed to find tiny tumors

summary: Researchers have developed a near-infrared fluorescent optical imaging system that could enable them to find tiny tumors, as small as a couple of hundred cells, deep within the body.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have developed a near-infrared fluorescent optical imaging system that could enable them to find tiny tumors, as small as a couple of hundred cells, deep within the body.
